name: Queen of the Blazing Domain
text:
Cannot be destroyed by card effects. If this card is in your hand: You can target up to 2 cards you control, including a face-up Spell/Trap; destroy them, and if you do, Special Summon this card. If you destroyed 1 card, return this card to the hand during the End Phase of the next turn, or if you destroyed 2, this card gains this effect instead.
‚óè Any monster sent from the field to your opponent's GY is banished instead.
You can only use this effect of "Queen of the Blazing Domain" once per turn.
